direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle tag management with similar control flows and parameter handling.
Both methods remove elements (tags vs. attributes) from the safelist, operating on similar data structures.
Both methods modify the safelist configuration, but one adds enforced attributes while the other removes tags.
Both methods handle potential exceptions related to removing elements from the safelist.
Both methods access and manipulate the safelist's tagNames set.

enhanced_by.reason: Initializing the safelist is necessary before adding or removing tags.
Environment setup is required before modifying the safelist.
Both methods verify the removal of elements and handle similar exceptions.
